content.detailedDescription:
oct. 14th, 2:30 am, i was in twin falls idaho, had just picked up a trailer as i'm a truck driver and had parked for my break. i parked in a dark area with a clear view, very little light contamination, looking in the e. s.E. direction, and first noted an object larger than the other stars. it was moving erratically and the light changes in it were fascinating. i had no idea what it was but it didn't belong and seemed out of place. the object was cylindrical in shape, ascending, descending, darting and swooping, at times appearing to jettison more than one object, accelerating, decelerating, breaking up and coming back together. the color changes were the most fascinating in the full spectrum.
i watched this for about 12 minutes where the object made a radical triangular turn to the left, then straight up, turning bright red at its bottom and a noticeable vapor like trail beneath it and vanished!!As soon as i saw this object in the beginning i grabbed my camera(i always carry a camera with me just for such an event)and started to capture the photos i've provided.
content.summary: Parked vehicle in dark area noticed radical color changes and rapid movement of object!

content.detailedDescription:
So this morning i awake at 4:58am (cause i looked at my clock) to a hum or "frequency" tone outside. i live next to the ocean- so we have sirens in case of emergencies like tsunamis our sirens tones change and are not a constant tone. and also go off in multiples.
this was one singular tone, not crazy loud but loud enough to wake me up from a dead sleep, never changing in sound/ frequency or vibration but one solid tone for close to 45 minutes. i laid in bed for about 5 minutes just listening in to that one tone humming away. i usually get up by 5:15-5:30 so i decide  "i need to just get up- cannot snooze with this sound anyways" so i get outta bed and immediately go to the door and go outside. i have two dogs who didn't seem bothered in the slightest. i turn on my porch light and stand there for about 5 minutes to see if my neighbors may come out and see what the sound is. no one seems to hear it or come out so i look up and around- see nothing and go back in the house. i turn on my tv lay on the couch with my dogs and then the hum outside abruptly stops at id say about quarter to 6am. i think to myself "thank goodness" 
at around 6:30 i went outside to my car to grab a certain pair of shoes i left in the car from the work day before to only look up and see this white and blueish hued smoke trail with a big red ball of light zipping around and i almost fell over my jaw fell. id say more than half of this design photographed was already completed by the time i had seen it was near the tail end of its "path" it moved in all directions at some points seemingly stopping in mid air and changing course. and before i knew it it show to the left and vanished. 
baffled from what i had just seen i ran into the house and grabbed my ipad and started taking photos. a neighbor of mine is witness to this from his regular morning walk.
i go to work at about 7am everyday so i took as many decent pics as i could and zipped to work! i had to show a coworker before this floating trail disappeared. 
i get to work run in and tell my coworker to come outside and he proceeds and he sees some of the same remaining trail, i proceed to tell him what i saw and show him my ipad pictures and i say to him "it was a red ball of light" and we looked back up as i pointed to the area in the sky and we both witnessed the red ball of light appear and then vanish in the morning sky.
many people around my county have taken pictures of this as well. so there are literally probably hundreds of people who witnessed this event

side note:
we have an airforce base 58 miles away. and the base said it was "likely" some kind of missle they sent out this morning. i saw it in the east which would have been over san luis obispo but the missle was said to be shot off west over the ocean and 58 miles south... sightings stretched from templeton to arroyo grande due east- not over the ocean at all. but this is no missle i have ever seen nor has my neighbor or my coworker and why would it reappear? or changed directions so quickly?
content.summary: They say it was possibly a "missle"

content.detailedDescription:
We came out of movie. only a few cars there.
first noticed. only 1small cloud moving slowly in cloudless sky
content.summary: I small cloud in dark sky. it went east and down to just above horizon. then i noticed movement in the cloud and suddenly appeared moving out of cloud. it was glowing but i only saw first part of craft. it looked like a saucer.  my wife driving told me to

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon its ernesto here again this is my second story about my fist ufo signing in january 1981 .Ive all ready send in my report of my second sighting earlier today,,it was a sunday night in january 1981 the time was around 3.30 to 3.45 pm i was going home from my friends house in ashby 3 miles away from scunthorpe i turned right on to the main road to go down burringham road hill as i started to go down the hill something made me look up to the sky i dont know why i looked up as this is something at the time i never done before and as i looked up there it was a silver disc going in and out of the clouds the ufo has like tiny little windows all around it at least i think they were windows because they were yellow in colour and it looked  to me like it had its lights on inside, as the ufo rotated round and round though the dark and then lighter clouds because it was getting dark the lights around it gave what look like a glowing effect there was no sound coming from it. i speeded down the hill to try follow it but i had no chance of catching up with it and it was not moving fast it just looked as if it was monitoring the area i cant be exact of the ufo's altitude but the way i would discribe it the height was about twice the height of what an helicopers flys ,the ufo headed towards the village of burringham and kidby bridge i only wish i had a camara that day ,and there was no one around that night so i could of stopped my car and said to someone look up there a ufo ,,there was not even a car in view and all so in my second sighting that ive all ready told you about even then i was with no witness both times ,and like i said in my first report this ufo i saw was only days after the rendlesham forest incident in suffolk in 1980 on december 26th ,,its know here in the uk as the british roswell ,, please ignore in my first report as i stated just the 1980 roswell incident i meant to write remdlesham forest incident hope this did'nt confuse you ,,ive included a sketch ive made the ufo a bit to big it was smaller than on the sketch and a little higher in the sky
 thanks ernesto
content.summary: A january night 1981 coming back home after visting a friend i see a siliver disc with sparlking yellow lights all around the sides

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a short trip from my house to a local store to grab a bite to eat. i was heading west and spotted a silver very shiny object at an unknown but very high altitude. i've seen plenty of airplanes and at first thought that was all it was, till it changed direction then vanished. what drew my attention to the sky was very odd cloud patterns. i know i shouldn't be looking at the sky while driving but i took some quick glances. the road i was on was straight. from the time i seen it till the time i stopped the car couldn't have been more than a minute. after seeing it vanish i pulled over and tried to find it again in the sky to no avail. there were no planes in the area that i could see. there were some high clouds but they were small and thin (and odd looking). i waited and waited but didn't see anything come out from behind any clouds so i presume whatever it was vanished.

this is not the first time i've seen a ufo and probably wont be the last. due to the height, all i saw was a very bright silvery dot. it would have been seen as an airplane catching the sun just right had it not changed direction and vanished. if i had to estimate, it was roughly over greensboro, nc or somewhere thereabouts.

i'm not certain what it was but i'm certain it wasn't your normal airplane.
content.summary: Was driving and spotted odd "aircraft" then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were on vacation in costa rica at a resort near culebra. it was the last night we would be there and so i decided to go down to the beach and stargaze, which i do often. this was sometime around 10 p.M., but i am not sure. the moon was due sw and was around 55 degrees above the horizon, probably higher but not lower. that might indicate a time. i spent probably 25-30 minutes there before heading back, as i couldn't see much due to the bright moon. while walking back to the buildings (perhaps a 2-3 minute walk) i decided to look for the brightest star in the sky, something i also do often. i found it immediately, approximately 70 degrees above the horizon due nnw. it was somewhat brighter than jupiter would be on a clear night, but wasn't so unnaturally bright as to be immediately recognized as unnatural. while it was a mostly clear night, some stray clouds (cirrostratus, i think) were in the sky. they weren't thick, but they did obscure the stars around the object. it was clear that the object was behind the clouds, which is what made me interested in it. this star, or object, was sufficiently bright from behind the clouds to still be the brightest in the sky, and with a bright moon. i stopped walking to stand there and watch the clouds move away from the object, taking around 10-15 seconds. of course, the star-object became slightly brighter as a result. then, as i watched, it suddenly accelerated to the left, or west, and disappeared. the acceleration was unlike any i have seen, going from no movement to an incredibly high speed in apparently less time than human eyes are capable of seeing. it moved an unknown distance, but if i were to make a "peace" or "v" sign with my index and middle fingers, and held my hand out as far as possible, it would have appeared to travel the distance between those two fingers. or, at arm's reach, around 2-3 inches. it traveled that distance in about 1/2 of a second. at the end of that distance, it continued, but it was now quickly fading while moving left, with no apparent change of velocity. that took only 1/4 of a second. it is possible that the disappearance was the object leaving earth's orbit, and that the object was ascending while moving west. after that, there was no more sighting and i slowly walked back to the resort. i then felt amazement at what i had witnessed, immediately convinced that it was either from some origin other than humans, or that it was some incredible new human creation. either way, it was clearly not the following possible explanations:

1: a conventional military aircraft. it hovered, not possible for planes, and it's velocity was too high for a vtol. not to mention that the acceleration the object would not be possible for any known aircraft, and for several reasons.

2: a space station. while space stations can appear as bright stars that move, they cannot be unmoving, be unmoving and accelerate, move that fast, or disappear.

3. a meteoroid. while an object such as this, when falling to earth, will certainly travel very fast and then disappear, it would not be unmoving and then suddenly accelerate.

a summary: an object, appearing as an unusually bright star, is visible behind cloud cover. it maintains its position for over 10 seconds before suddenly accelerating, apparently instantly, to an incredibly high speed. then, while keeping its speed, it fades and disappears.

i attached a google earth view of the bay i was in, for your use.

i would like to state that i was under the influence of no drugs, alcohol, or other agents that could have caused me to see things that weren't there.

please do not hesitate to contact me via email for clarification or follow-up. thank you.
content.summary: A bright, star-like object that suddenly moved and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work in front in the sky directly ahead of me, i spotted a beautiful blue and gold craft. i thought it was an airplane as the direction it was pointing towards in a route toward our airport.  the surprise was that other planes were in fact flying but were much higher and were not as clearly visible.  as i watched the craft it seemed to not be moving. i was stopped at a red light and then i really noticed that it as barely moving and it did not have wings, or tail, or any qualities associated with airplanes.  air planes don't hoover.  the colors thrown me, because it was very colorful with one half a clear blue color and the back half was gold.  but it did not fit in the skies with other planes, it was clearly visible and seemed much,larger.  as the light turned green i crossed the intersection and watched it from my car window.  i turned into a mcdonalds parking lot and parked my car to watch. others began to pull over in their vehicles and park behind me and they too began to watch. i stood their pointing and watching then two small orbs appeared next the "cigar shaped craft" and as they approached the craft they seemed to circle the craft and fly next to it. then the "cigar shaped craft" began to move off very slowly into the distance until i watch it fade in the far distance. i thought to myself "what the hell!", "it's broad day light for goodness sakes, during rush hour traffic, over a crowded sky, without a cloud in the sky! the blue and gold "craft" floated away and i didn't seem to care if people saw it or not!

my second story is not so exciting, but a bit strange. i have had a small 3 foot by 3 foot circle of what looked like burned grass in my backyard for at lease two years. a perfect circle with grass growing in the middle, but with a dry, dead grass ring surrounding it.  i've tried everything to get grass to grow their including this year digging and planting seeds. when ever i have guest over, or bbq in the backyard i take them over to show them my crop circle.  my sister said it's from the sun's intense light burning it shape in the ground.  but i never seen or heard of that
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft with two orb escots.In the sky near my home over mcdonalds

content.detailedDescription: Car-like object, landed in ally
content.summary: Car-like object, landed in ally

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-20 just west of pell city, al. i noticed a large black object hovering over the interstate. i whipped out my camera and tried to record it. i estimate the object to be around 80' long and approx 300' off of the deck. i observed it for about 2 miles of interstate before passing underneath it. i could not see any windows or features to the object, and it appeared stationary. my wife was traveling less than ten minutes behind me and was not able to positively id the object, as it had moved away by then. i looked at what i had recorded and did a screen grab of the object zoomed in. i will attach both files. unfortunately, the video makes it appear much smaller than what i was observing. anyways, i don't know what it was, thought maybe you would be interested.
content.summary: 80 ft long black cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
I was just going for a walk along the beach and thought the clouds looked beautiful. i took some photos as i'm a keen amateur photographer. in particular the sun reflecting off the clouds looked beautiful, so i took 2 shots, one close up and one further out. when i git home i went through the pictures and came across the orb. i played around with the filters, checked that it wasn't dust and reviewed the other photos. it was the only one with the orb. when i increase the definition, it clearly looks like an orb in the sky, just stationary. i performed lots of checks as mentioned, dust, reflections etc but none of the other photos had it and they were all taken at the same time. 

no idea what it was but very pleased i caught it!
content.summary: Orb captured in the skies of lincolnshire uk

content.detailedDescription: Hello mufon my name is  ernesto i live in scunthorpe uk ive allways wanted to tell someone about my 2 ufo stories i encounted in my town .Ive been watching your programme on h2 thats how i found out about you anyway my first ufo i saw was in one  1981 and the other one was in 2008 in my own back yard beleieve it or not but its true i will tell you about the ufo i saw in my back yard first and then i'll write a separate report about  the one i saw in 1981 ,,so i'll start with the second sighting first,it was around 5.45 on the 4th of november 2008 i was in my back yard because that same day  a paserby pointed out one of my rear brake lights was'nt working so i had to wait for night time to fall so i could put a new bulb in and as i live on my own i had to wait for night fall so i could press the brake light against the rear was to see if both lights worked ok when i put the new bulb in anyway i put a new bulb in but still not working so i when to check the fuses under my steering so i was bobed down and as i bobed down to start the fuse check just above the houses in front of me an object was passing by from left to right i could'nt believe what i was seeing infact it was so pitch dark all ready which is unusually for 5.45 pm, so i could not see the shape of the ufo it was to dark but what i saw was 4 large yellow lights at the rear of the ufo 2 large lights one on the left and one on the right and just below it it had 2 smaller yellow lights these smaller lights were flashing on and off as it passed by there was not one sound coming from this thing and was not spinning this ufo was flying in a  straight line and was flying about 100 feet about the houses this is something that no helicoper or plane would ever in a residential area it would be against the law to fly that low but ufo's fly as they please , anyway i ran in to get my camara and when i came out it was still there in the distance but as i pointed my camara at it i could'nt get the lights to focus in my camara this was really strange maybe i was'nt pointed it right because by now it was in the distance then all i saw was the ufo dip and disappeared .Would you believe no one had reported seeing this within our town its so strange it came in my yard and no one else saw this what is this all about i asked my self first i see a ufo in january 1981 and now this ,i drew this scetch of the lights i saw on the night i drew this 10 minutes after the sighting while it was still fresh in my mind,,anyway i never believed in ufo until i saw the one in january 1981 and you know what i saw the 1981 ufo abou 2 weeks after the roswell incident that happened on the 26th december 1980..I will right about my 1980 ufo sighting a bit later tonight when i have time,,thanks ernesto
content.summary: 4 yellow light at rear of the ufo top side to side light large 2 below smaller the smaller light flashed on and off and it passeed by

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting those pictures attached posted by many benguela residents that reported and recorded that...
content.summary: Here inangola, benguela people reported to see as seen in the pics kind of spaceship

content.detailedDescription: I was in my livin groom when i saw a light out of the corner of my eye. i had a look and thought it was a meteor, so grabbed my phone and went on to the balcony to see if i could record it. i soon realised that it was not a meteor as it had no trail and did not burn up. the object appeared to be moving at speed as it crossed the whole sky in about 3 minutes. in the video the object appears to flicker, but this is because it was filmed through a net on the balcony. it actually appeared solid. i'm certain it was not a chinese lantern as it moved fast, looked large, and did not waver in any form. i filmed for a couple of minutes, then observed it fly over the nearby airport and then vanish. the day after i did a search for ufo sightings and found that there was a sighting of the same object from the iss on the same day.
content.summary: Orange sphere ufo

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home to florida from new jersey on i- 95 sb around kingsland ga near the florida ga border. it was about 1 am when i saw a light in the sky a few hundred feet above the trees east of me in the woods a few hundred yards back on the other side of the road. at first i thought it was a tower with a light attached to it because of how high it was.  as i got closer i could tell that it wasn't a tower because it was a lot brighter and the light was pulsating getting stronger and weaker but only slightly.  i woke my wife up who was sleeping when i first saw it and asked her what she thought it was. we were both unsure and kept watching it as we were driving, because it was still visible to us in front of us. the object than started to change somewhat. i am not sure if it was because it was starting to move or because it changed shape.  when we first observed the object it was oval in shape but than it started to move slowly and kind of turned into a tear drop shape horizontally with the whole object glowing. the color of the object the whole time was a pale yellow orange light.  it started to clearly move horizontally now in a manner parallel to ground. it was hard to tell how fast because we were moving ourselves as i was still driving. it flew towards the east for a few seconds and than started to ascend higher at a rapid pace.  it made a sharp turn to the right of the path it was taking and straight up at a rate that was faster than any object i have ever seen move.  as fast as it was moving it was still visible as a light moving towards the stars until it was to far away to be seen. my wife and i felt that we had both seen something out of the ordinary and were more curious than anything else.
content.summary: Hovering object took off at great rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was late at night between 10.30 pm and 12.30 am i cannot recall exact time. i was letting my dogs out in the yard and standing at the backdoor. i live in a semi rural location,there is a garden of aprox 1/2 an acre backing on to mine so i have an unspoilt view of the sky and look up at the stars most nights because i find it beautiful and my interest outside the mainstream is in metaphysics so i look up wondering what unseen forces are out there,rather than looking for ufos. 

anyway a small star (aprox to my east) caught my eye as it shone very brightly, although i dont know the names of the stars i look at the sky for at least a short time each night and knew this was unusual, a very bright star/planet(sorry i dont know and dont want to guess as you will know what is visable from northwest uk ) i see every night was (aprox north east and higher in the sky. when i called my dogs back in i looked back over at the bright star and stood observing it, after about 10 seconds it glowed even brighter then took off at a 45 degree angle towards the south east, and left a faint trail visable for aprox 1/2 a second then disapeared. it took off so fast and at such and angle that i cannot imagine it being a manmade craft.

whilst i have always believed there must be alien life out there due to the vastness of our universe, i have never actively looked for ufos, and never expected to see one. i didnt even know there was star like type ufos until i did a bit of research,and at the time i didnt know it was a ufo until it took off. in the tick questions i didnt say it affected me mentally,because im not sure if this counts but i knew straight away after it took off it was a ufo but felt a sense of awe and calm rather than fear or panic. had it been closer i may have felt very differently though.

there are aircraft in my local area all the time,commercial jets,light aircraft,helicopters less often, and even small drones but iv come to know what these look and sound like, so i am 100% sure iv not confused it with any of these things. there was a small airplane aprox to north at the time, they move slowly and have lights at night. 

also my dad is generally skeptical but has had some paranormal encounters,and when i told him i expected him to make a bit of fun of me, instead he told me he saw exactly the same thing 35 years ago when i was a babe in arms in a location 40ish miles away from where i saw this. because it wasnt a dramatic encounter he had almost forgotten about it and thats why he hadnt shared his this with me before.

i saw a mufon on tv and decided i should report what i saw, as after some research there seems to have been a lot of ufo sightings on or around 23/09/15 date globally. authorities worldwide are obviously not sharing what they know with the public,but having seen something with my own eyes i want anwsers.
content.summary: Small star glowing brighter than others,took off upwards at 45 degree and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: At 4:40am i was pushing my motorcycle out of my garage when i noticed a orange light in the southern sky that resembled a bright planet / star. it was at least as bright as venus in the clear predawn sky (brightest object in the sky that morning). curious, i tried to identify it with google sky maps on my phone to no avail. that's when i realized it was slowly ascending. i took a short video with my phone then grabbed my monocular out of my truck and when i got the object into focus it was apparent there were actually two identical cone shaped objects. after a few moments they stopped ascending and seemed to move horizontally to my left then one of the objects flickered and faded and abruptly fell/descended to the horizon. shortly after that the remaining object flickered and faded out of sight.
content.summary: Bright orange light(s) ascending, separating, falling and fadeing.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from waterford, saw that we needed gas and pulled off i75 to john r to get it. wife noticed it in the sky and started filming it. it was really bright and we were facing west and it was traveling east and turned and went south then started coming back at us. then we lost it when we started for the expressway after getting gas. just before we got to the exprssway i saw it again and snapped a picture then all of a sudden the light flickered out and we did not see it again.
content.summary: It went south then turned around and came back at us.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard & at 11:30 pm and an unusually large & extremely bright odd orange-colored light glided low & slow in a direct line from north to south above me disappearing suddenly after about 10 seconds with a diminished size in the blink of an eye to the size of a distant pin-point star. we have 20 acres & the view was directly overhead with no tree obstruction. in 25 years i have seen many meteor showers, shooting stars & tracked satellites, as well as observed planes, helicopters & military aircraft (including flair drops out over the beach) & this was unlike anything i have ever seen. it was completely silent & left absolutely no trailing noise which, of course, even the highest jet leaves behind. in addition, the normal flight-path is not directly over our property but, closer to the shoreline which is approximately 3 miles from our property. the sky was clear & we are fortunate to have no street-lights/city-lights. the moon had already set low behind the neighboring tree-line leaving a clear view of a zillion bright-white twinkling stars. military maneuver? atmospheric illusion of some sort? hoping someone else in the general charleston/beaufort, sc area towards savannah, ga may have seen and/or reported as well.
content.summary: Unusually large, slow-moving, low, completely silent bright orange light with 6-8 star-like points

content.detailedDescription: On 10-19-2015 i was on a flight from louisville to phoenix arizona. i was seated in a window seat on the right side of the aircraft. we were at cruise altitude of 36000 ft over i think was colorado, the morning sun was on the left side of our aircraft. i looked out the window and saw a contrail that had a dirty smoke look about it. i thought it may be another aircraft near us. i began looking for the other plane but never seen it. after another 5 minutes we began to get some cloud cover under us and i noticed the trail again, but now i could see a very white round shape at the front of the contrail. i got out my phone and began recording. it is difficult to see however it was there and it did not look like any aircraft that i have seen.
content.summary: Seen out window at 36000 ft

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at stars over dayton ohio from centerville seen a yellow orange light  no strobes got binoculars out still no strobes or any landing lights follwed light from north to northwest at that point light disappears and reappeared over west and then south finally going beyond my line of sight
content.summary: Thought i was looking at a planet

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at stars over dayton ohio from centerville seen a yellow orange light  no strobes got binoculars out still no strobes or any landing lights follwed light from north to northwest at that point light disappears and reappeared over west and then south finally going beyond my line of sight
content.summary: Thought i was looking at a planet

content.detailedDescription:
8 lights toghether then some dimer and some stayed, i was at the freeway ( not driving ) 
i was so exited, and i only would appreciate a profetional opinion to know if it was real !
content.summary: Huge lights toghether

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin were outside in my back yard the first time i saw it it came out of nowhere and it zipped in different directions this lasted for about one minute and fifty seconds until it straightened out and vanished it was blurry and changed  shape as it moved left and right me and my cousin both believe we saw a ufo he was a sceptic before but now believes me and him ran to the direction we last saw it and followed it for about half   a mile but there was no trace of it the next time i saw it though i was quick enough to take a quick photo but when i looked at the photo it was all blurred around the craft but you can see every thing els fine    when i first saw it i thought   it was a plane but then i saw it moving in directions very fast and it did not look like a plane  i first noticed the craft because i was looking in that direction and it just seemed to appear out of  no ware i looked like a fussy grayish orb that when it moved left or right it seem to go all static and crazy i lost sight of it when it got to the front of my house and disappeared as fast as it came i felt scared at the time and still do because i have no idea what it was ands it seems to be a rescuing thing in my  neighborhood  i hope you can look into this case and thank you
content.summary: Was in backyard and saw it hover , descend then took off in straight path

content.detailedDescription: Driving n/nw along strykers road when a very bright light was observed rapidly descending some distance away, lopatcong or possibly as far as belvidere. at first seemed like a meteor, but noticed there were few other stars and it was descending very rapidly. the object was very bright and descended at an extreme speed, unlike anything else i have ever seen. it was bright white and did not leave a trail. i felt disoriented after this experience. i lost sight of the object at the tree line and would not have been able to pinpoint where it landed in the distance. time from first sight to landing was likely less than a second.
content.summary: Bright object descending rapidly from sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck observing the sky with my binoculars just before darkness fell when i noticed some 'stars' that were too dim to be naked eye objects.  this wasn't a big deal, but it became one when i noticed that one of the objects was slowly moving southward relative to the background stars.  i supposed that it was simply a satellite but upon returning my gaze to the origin of the 'satellite' saw another identical object, but this one was heading to the northwest.  i would follow them visually until they became obscured behind nearby trees or buildings, and ultimately counted five objects each moving away from the same point of origin that was very close(just to the right) to the star markab(α pegasi).
content.summary: Was observing the stars with my 'fancy' binoculars when i saw multiple starlike objects move in various directions

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner #18809. on 10/20/15 in rancho cucamonga california.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
witness went fishing on sunday september 6th at 3 am on the great south bay near amity harbor. while near tanner park, on the water, witness saw a star that seemed out of place in the sky. it was too bright and in the north. the weather was windy. witness watched the star for a few minutes and then it dimmed down to dark, leaving a reddish purple after glow when it went out. it then appeared in a different part of the sky as bright as before. it was higher than the planes taking off from jfk airport, because they blocked out the light when they passed it. witness set anchor at gilgo island and watched the bright light over the robert moses bridge. it once again dimmed and left a reddish purple after glow when it went out.It then ascended at a high rate of speed and turned into three bright white lights. it could have been one object, because the lights stayed the same distance apart. it ascended higher than the space station toward the southwest where the witness watched it disappear into the early morning light of dawn, over the ocean.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While fishing on great south bay i saw a too bright star that dimmed out and reappeared in another place

content.detailedDescription: I was outside late one evening having a smoke and looking at the stars when from over to my right i could see 4 bright ball shaped lights flying in formation. my first thoughts were why the raf would be flying this late so close to each other. they seemed quite a distance away and had passed over/near to a top us military observation base that's a couple of miles away. as they passed in front of me they changed positions. they were flying 2 at the front and 2 at the rear but then 1 at a time the ones at the front went to the rear in a diagonal move as if it went backwards even though they were still all flying forwards (this is when i knew they were ufos). they all changed positions as they continued across the sky then all accelerated upwards and vanished towards space, not over the horizon. i was really shocked after i saw them and felt amazed at what i had witnessed almost it felt unbelievable. i ran in the house and told my gf (ex) what i had seen but she didn't believe it. a couple of days later i looked on the internet and saw that other people had witnessed similar things that weekend. even to this day i can not stand outside my house without feeling what i felt that night and often wonder if i will see them again and since that night i have felt different in my mood and how i look at things in our lives.
content.summary: 4 bright white lights flying in formation in the dark of night

content.detailedDescription: It was 11:30 on a thursday night. it was overcast. i was sitting outside my house in a lawn chair having a ciragette and looking around (to the northwest) when something to the southwest caught my attention. it was a very large and very bright object streaking across the sky. when i caught sight of it, it was above the three story house next to mine. it had three large very bright green lights(the color of a traffic light, but it appeared to be one solid object i did not see the front of the craft, it was past me by the time i saw it. it left a green trail but only for a second. i would estimate the size to be aournd the length of my car (2005 chevy tahoe) not the back but the length of the side of the car. it was totally silent but i did not realize that until about ten minutes later because i was so stunned at the time. it only took a matter of seconds for it to shoot across the sky and it was on a downward trajectory. at the time that it was going overhead i remember putting my hands on the arms of the chair and bracing for an impact. i thought to myself that when that thing hits the ground it is going to sound like an atomic bomb going off. after several seconds i realized it was not going to impact the ground and that stunned me even more. i am 65 years old and have been watching the sky my whole life and i have seen some pretty strange things but this shook me up badly. i was a solid object, going faster than anything i have ever seen, on a downward trajectory toward the ground, and it must have landed somewhere because it did not impact the earth. if it had it have made a noise hat could have been heard for many, many miles.
content.summary: Flew over the three story house next to my house extremely fast and headed in a downward direction

content.detailedDescription: i was walking to the store  and i stopped at the light. as i waited for the light i saw  a flicker so i trued my head and there it was sitting in the sky. it looked like a very bright star. i told my friend look at that star over the bank. as i ajusted my phone to see if i could record it this redish image apeared in the sky next to it. it was moving in place like something out of a movie.It made no sound  it was just there inside the redish what looked like energy was lights of diffrent colors. i was devistated and a bit curious because in the book of ezekiel it talks about things like this. ive heard lots of stories but never really see this.
content.summary: I was walking  to the store and  stopped to talk with my firend  as we waited for the light this light apeared and them another next to it and it jusy hovered over the chase bank

content.detailedDescription: Took picture of moon and then realized an additional object was in image.
content.summary: Took picture of moon and then realized an additional object was in image.
